title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action "Add Javadoc Comment" in the Edit menu or any other global menu. Currently, it seems that the distribution of actions is based on personal taste and it is not clear to users why some actions are available in the context menu and some are not. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view just to access certain actions from the editor. We should make all actions reachable from the editor, either through the context menu or in some other way.
OB: The action "Add Javadoc Comment" is not available in the context menu.
